section.title: Configure Sendmail Options
section.para:
Sets various Sendmail options to mask its version, enforces privacy ( noexpn and novrfy ), disables interactive help, ensures log level is at least nine, and prevents sendmail from finding and using $HOME/.forward files. .forward
sendmail
This module sets the privacy options and the log level to the defaults.
The following options will be set in the respective configuration file:
section.programlisting: O PrivacyOptions=authwarnings,novrfy,noexpn,restrictqrun O LogLevel=9 O ForwardPath=/dev/null O AllowBogusHELO=False O SmtpGreetingMessage=Mail Server Ready ; $b
section.para: NOTE: The DISA UNIX STIG (GEN004580) requests the removal of each userâ€™s .forward file. However, this module sets the ForwardPath option to /dev/null to prevent Sendmail from finding them. Individual .forward files should be manually removed to satisfy auditors. /devFiles and Directories/dev/dev/nullFiles and Directories/dev/null
